name: Dice Combat
description:
[GOAL]: Deplete your opponent's home base health before they deplete yours.

Choose your abilities to be activated on each dice roll. After 3 rolls (or after death) you're able to edit your ability deck before rolling again. 

When a player dies, the surviving player attacks the opposing player's home base, dealing their regular attack as damage. The dead player is revived with starting values: 3 HEALTH, 0 DEF, 1 ATK.

UI is a little cutoff if playing in the browser, so make sure to fullscreen :)

Home health is supposed to be larger than 2... I had that set for development, and it got left it in... oops!
